total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: Shift the identified locations of the number 1 one step to the left.
Q3: Identify the locations of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q4: Shift the identified locations of the number 2 one step to the right.
Q5: Identify the locations of the number 4 in the input grid.
Q6: Shift the identified locations of the number 4 one step to the right.
Q7: Replace the original locations of the numbers 1, 2, and 4 with the number 8.
Q8: Replace the new locations of the numbers 1, 2, and 4 with their respective numbers.
